h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area
content: Follow the fires again as they curve off slightly to the right, to reach the arena where you'll need to fight Yaoguai Chief Guangmou.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_1_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection 'Bell 2'.
The content is as follows:
Follow the fires again as they curve off slightly to the right, to reach the arena where you'll need to fight Yaoguai Chief Guangmou.
